about_the_game:
"The Green Light" is a first person horror game. Fred, a drug addict who relies on medication to control his hallucinations. His life takes a turn when he hears a voice on the radio. A tale of self-discovery, where the greatest demons we face are not lurking under our beds but within us...


"In The Green Light," players dive into the unsettling depths of Fred's troubled mind, exploring a narrative that blurs the line between sanity and madness. As Fred confronts his drug addiction, a mysterious voice on the radio becomes both his guiding light and his greatest challenge. This is a story of inner conflict and renewal, where past struggles collide with newfound hope.
